title: License
text: R package (yusufHAIGermany) released MIT License. included data (sim_monthly, sim_weekly, sim_daily) synthetic derivatives publicly available data European Centre Disease Prevention Control (ECDC) Point Prevalence Survey Healthcare-Associated Infections Antimicrobial Use European Acute Care Hospitals, 2011–2012. Original data © European Centre Disease Prevention Control (ECDC), 2013. Licensed Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License (CC 4.0). See https://creativecommons.org/licenses//4.0/ details. simulation transformation code used generate synthetic datasets (data-raw/simulate_hai_germany.R) © 2025 Yusuf Romadhon licensed MIT License.

title: yusufHAIGermany
text: Original data reference: Zacher, B., Haller, S., Willrich, N., Walter, J., Abu Sin, M., Cassini, ., Plachouras, D., Suetens, C., Behnke, M., Gastmeier, P., Wieler, L. H., & Eckmanns, T. (2019).Application new methodology R package reveals high burden healthcare-associated infections (HAI) Germany compared average European Union/European Economic Area, 2011–2012.Eurosurveillance, 24(46). https://doi.org/10.2807/1560-7917.ES.2019.24.46.1900135 Data licensed Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 (CC 4.0).

title: yusufHAIGermany
code: library(yusufHAIGermany)  # Explore simulated monthly data head(sim_monthly)  # Summarise DALYs by infection type library(dplyr) sim_monthly |>   group_by(hai) |>   summarise(total_dalys = sum(dalys))

code: # yusufHAIGermany 0.1.0 - Initial release: simulation datasets and Shiny dashboard  # Development version - Added vignette “Germany HAI Explorer” - Improved plot consistency and app layout

title: yusufHAIGermany
text: Package code © 2025 Yusuf Romadhon, licensed MIT License. Data source: ECDC PPS 2011–2012, licensed CC 4.0. Please cite original ECDC dataset Zacher et al. (2019) using derived results.

title: yusufHAIGermany
text: Developed ETC5523 – Communicating Data (Monash University, 2025). Instructor: Michael Lydeamore Built tidyverse, lubridate, usethis, shiny.

title: yusufHAIGermany
text: Install package → pak::pak("ETC5523-2025/...") Launch app → launch_app() View vignette → browseVignettes("yusufHAIGermany") Check changelog → NEWS.md View documentation via pkgdown site Note: dataset combination orginal source pdf simulated time series

what: Simulated German HAI daily series, 2011–2012 — sim_daily
title: Simulated German HAI daily series, 2011–2012 — sim_daily
text: Simulated German HAI daily series, 2011–2012

title: Simulated German HAI daily series, 2011–2012 — sim_daily
Simulated German HAI daily series, 2011–2012 — sim_daily
text: tibble columns: date Date year Integer year yday Day--year (1–366) wday Day--week (1=Mon, 7=Sun) hai Character infection type cases_day Integer simulated cases deaths_day Integer simulated deaths dalys_day Numeric simulated DALYs

what: Simulated German HAI monthly series, 2011–2012 — sim_monthly
title: Simulated German HAI monthly series, 2011–2012 — sim_monthly
text: Synthetic monthly counts DALYs HAI type (HAP, SSI, BSI, UTI, CDI).

title: Simulated German HAI monthly series, 2011–2012 — sim_monthly
Simulated German HAI monthly series, 2011–2012 — sim_monthly
text: tibble columns: date Date (first day month) year Integer year month Integer month hai Character infection type cases_month Integer simulated cases deaths_month Integer simulated deaths dalys_month Numeric simulated DALYs

what: Simulated German HAI weekly series, 2011–2012 — sim_weekly
title: Simulated German HAI weekly series, 2011–2012 — sim_weekly
text: Simulated German HAI weekly series, 2011–2012

title: Simulated German HAI weekly series, 2011–2012 — sim_weekly
Simulated German HAI weekly series, 2011–2012 — sim_weekly
text: tibble columns: date Date ISO week start (Monday) year Integer year iso_week Integer ISO week number hai Character infection type cases_week Integer simulated cases deaths_week Integer simulated deaths dalys_week Numeric simulated DALYs
